all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And again, the elders, priests and teachers of this church shall teach the principles of my gospel, which are in the Bible and the Book of Mormon, in the which is the fulness of the gospel.
Doctrine and Covenants 42:12
Quote of the Day
"Regardless of where we are on our path of discipleship, our lives will fundamentally change if we better understand who we really are."
Elder Brik V. Eyre | 1 Oct 2025General Conference
